Posts.Content: good morning my name is debbie I am 52 yrs old and also have this type of cancer. I was also told back in March as your mom was. There is a site that will give you you & your mom HOPE...and I will also give you a number that you can call. The site is>>> www.blochcancer.org the phone number is 1-800-433-0464.....I would read the site first, and believe me you will have hope for your mom. I am a christian and always believe that God has the last say concerning everything. If you would like to write me please do so any time. --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, email address removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---- debbie
Posts.Title: Worried 14 Year Old
